content: निवृ {c5c} {c9c} {c1c} <ab>U.</ab> To surround, enclose; <ls>Bk. 14. 29.</ls> {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To ward off, keep away from, avert from (with <ab>abl.</ab>); पापान्निवारयति योजयते हिताय <ls>Bh. 2. 72</ls>; निवारयंती महतो मुनिव्रतात् <ls>Ku. 5. 3.</ls> {@--2@} To surround, protect.
